Interface BalanceFragment<T extends GraphQLVariableHolder<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the super type of the interface
    All Superinterfaces:
    GraphQLVariableHolder<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AppFragment<T>, IdentityFragment<T>, UserFragment<T>, WalletFragment<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface BalanceFragment<T extends GraphQLVariableHolder<T>>
extends GraphQLVariableHolder<T>
    A fragment interface used to include information in a request on the Trusted Platform.
    See Also:
    BalancesService
